rules.natural: If the person has a skill in epidemiology, then the person has a skill in diagnostics.
Whenever the disease is identified for its origin, either the animal is infected by the disease or the animal is infected by the disease.
If the researcher publishes findings in a journal, then the researcher develops a vaccine for the disease.
Whenever the researcher develops a vaccine for the disease, the researcher develops a treatment for the disease.
Under the condition that the researcher develops a treatment for the disease, the disease is identified for its origin.
If the person has a skill in diagnostics, then the person has a skill in virology.
If the researcher uses the lab as a platform, then, provided that the person has a skill in virology, the person controls the outbreak of the disease.
If the researcher uses the field as a platform, then, under the condition that the person has a skill in virology, the person controls the outbreak of the disease.
Provided that the researcher studies the bat as an animal, the researcher uses the lab as a platform.
Either the researcher studies the bat as an animal or the researcher studies the rodent as an animal.
Whenever the researcher studies the rodent as an animal, the researcher uses the field as a platform.
Under the condition that the animal is infected by the disease, the researcher uses the lab as a platform.
If the animal is infected by the disease, then the researcher uses the field as a platform.

(A1 → A2).natural: If the person has a skill in epidemiology, then the person has a skill in diagnostics.

(A1 → G).natural: Provided that the person has a skill in epidemiology, that person controls the outbreak of the disease.

(A10 → (A8 ∨ A9)).natural: Whenever the disease is identified for its origin, either the animal is infected by the disease or the animal is infected by the disease.

(A11 → A10).natural: Under the condition that the researcher publishes findings in a journal, the disease is identified for its origin.

(A11 → A12).natural: If the researcher publishes findings in a journal, then the researcher develops a vaccine for the disease.

(A12 → A10).natural: Provided that the researcher develops a vaccine for the disease, the disease is identified for its origin.

(A12 → A13).natural: Whenever the researcher develops a vaccine for the disease, the researcher develops a treatment for the disease.

(A13 → A10).natural: Under the condition that the researcher develops a treatment for the disease, the disease is identified for its origin.

(A2 → A3).natural: If the person has a skill in diagnostics, then the person has a skill in virology.

(A2 → G).natural: Provided that the person has a skill in diagnostics, that person controls the outbreak of the disease.

(A3 → G).natural: Whenever the person has a skill in virology, the person controls the outbreak of the disease.

(A4 → (A3 → G)).natural: If the researcher uses the lab as a platform, then, provided that the person has a skill in virology, the person controls the outbreak of the disease.

(A4 ∨ A5).natural: Either the researcher uses the lab as a platform or the researcher uses the field as a platform.

(A5 → (A3 → G)).natural: If the researcher uses the field as a platform, then, under the condition that the person has a skill in virology, the person controls the outbreak of the disease.

(A6 → A4).natural: Provided that the researcher studies the bat as an animal, the researcher uses the lab as a platform.

(A6 ∨ A7).natural: Either the researcher studies the bat as an animal or the researcher studies the rodent as an animal.

(A7 → A5).natural: Whenever the researcher studies the rodent as an animal, the researcher uses the field as a platform.

(A8 → A4).natural: Under the condition that the animal is infected by the disease, the researcher uses the lab as a platform.

(A8 ∨ A9).natural: Either the animal is infected by the disease or the animal is infected by the disease.

(A9 → A5).natural: If the animal is infected by the disease, then the researcher uses the field as a platform.

A1.natural: The person has a skill in epidemiology.

A10.natural: The disease is identified for its origin.

A11.natural: The researcher publishes findings in a journal.

G.natural: The person controls the outbreak of the disease.
